title:
(Two-scale) $W^{1}L^{\Phi}$-gradient Young measures and homogenization
  of integral functionals in Orlicz-Sobolev spaces
authors: Joel Fotso Tachago, Hubert Nnang, Franck Tchinda, and Elvira Zappale
abstract:
(Two-scale) gradient Young measures in Orlicz-Sobolev setting are introduced
and characterized providing also an integral representation formula for non
convex energies arising in homogenization problems with nonstandard growth.
